idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# ========= Piano MIDI transcription helper for TunePad =========
# method：
# 1) Fill in the MIDI numbers of each section into the RHx/LHx sequence
# 2) Single-tune：   (60, 1)             # C4，quarter note
# 3) Chord： ([60,64,67], 1)     # Click C-E-G at the same time,quarter note
# 4) Tenuto：   ([60,64,67], 1, 2)  # Press 1 beat and sustain for 2 beats
# 5) Stop：   rest_beats(x)
# ======================================================================

from tunepad.chords import *

# ---- Utility function ----
def play_block(notes, beats=1, sustain=0):
    if isinstance(notes, int):
        playNote(notes, beats=beats, sustain=sustain)
        return
    try:
        playNote(notes, beats=beats, sustain=sustain)
    except Exception:
        # Fallback: Superimposed as simultaneous sound
        for i, n in enumerate(notes):
            playNote(n, beats=beats, sustain=sustain)
            if i < len(notes) - 1:
                rewind(beats)

def play_seq(seq):
    for item in seq:
        if len(item) == 2:
            notes, beats = item
            sustain = 0
        else:
            notes, beats, sustain = item
        play_block(notes, beats=beats, sustain=sustain)

def seq_len_beats(seq):
    total = 0
    for item in seq:
        total += item[1]
    return total

def rest_beats(b):
    rest(b)

def play_bar(rh, lh):
    len_rh = seq_len_beats(rh) if rh else 0
    len_lh = seq_len_beats(lh) if lh else 0
    bar_len = max(len_rh, len_lh)

    # The left hand first
    if lh:
        play_seq(lh)
    # Back to the beginning of the section
    if len_lh > 0:
        rewind(len_lh)
    # Then the right hand
    if rh:
        play_seq(rh)

    # If Rh is shorter than the LH, advance to the end of the measure
    tail = bar_len - len_rh
    if tail < 0:
        rest_beats(tail)

# ============== Compose the music bar by bar ==============


# ---- Section 1 ----
moveTo(0)
RH1 = [
    ([67,64,60], 1, 2),
    ([79,76,72,64,60], 1),
    ([77,67], 0.5),
    (64, 0.5),
    (67, 0.5),
    ([79,76,72], 0.5),
    (84, 0.5),
    ([79,67], 1, 2),
    ([74,70,67], 1),
]
LH1 = [
    ([40,43,40], 1, 2),(43, 0.5), ([48,40,52], 1),([59,52,55], 1),(52, 0.5)
]

# ---- Section 2 ----
RH2 = [
    ([74,70,67], 0.5),
    (63, 1),
    ([74,70,76,63], 2),
    ([69,66], 0.5),
    (70, 0.5),
    (75, 0.5),
    ([70,67], 0.5),
    ([91,86,85,72,79,75], 0.5),
    ([86,79,70], 1),
    ([72,69,65], 1),
]
LH2 = [
    ([46,43], 0.5),([43,46], 0.5),([51,55,58], 1), ([55,58,55], 1), (58, 1),  (55, 1)
]
# ---- Section 3 ----
RH3 = [
    ([72,79,75], 0.5),
    ([65,60], 0.5),
    (60, 1),
    ([80,81,77,65], 1),
    (69, 0.5),
    ([72,77,69], 0.5),
    (72, 0.5),
    (77, 0.5),
    ([89,81], 0.5),
    (84, 0.5),
    ([91,86,85,72,79,75], 0.5),
    ([86,79,70], 1),
    ([72,69,65], 1),
]
LH3 = [
    (48, 0.5),([48,45], 0.5),([53,57], 1), (57, 1),  (57, 1)
]

# ---- Section 4 ----
RH4 = [
    (70, 3),
    ([82,77,74], 0.5),
    ([77,70], 0.5),
    ([79,75,72,69], 0.5),
    ([79,75,72,69], 0.5),
    (60, 1),
    ([78,74,69], 1),
    (64, 2),
]
LH4 = [
    ([46,53,58], 0.5),(50, 0.5),([53,58], 0.5),([53,57], 1), ([55,51,45], 0.5),(37, 0.5),([50,38], 0.5), ([45,36], 0.5), 
]




# ============== Play order  ==============
play_bar(RH1, LH1)
play_bar(RH2, LH2)
play_bar(RH3, LH3)
play_bar(RH4, LH4)

# If there is a complete rest：
# rest_beats(4)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# bass
moveTo(0)
# Section 1
playNote(40, 1)               # E2
playNote(43, 0.5)             # G2
playNote(45, 0.5)             # A2
playNote(47, 1)               # B2
playNote(43, 1)               # G2

playNote([40, 45], 1)         # E2 + A2 chords
playNote(48, 0.5)             # C3
playNote(52, 0.5)             # E3
playNote(50, 1)               # D3
rest(0.5)
playNote(43, 0.5)

# Section 2
playNote(47, 1)
playNote(40, 1)
playNote([43, 50, 59])       

with bend(cents=[0, -5], beats=1):
    playNote(47, 1)          

rest(0.5)
playNote(43, 0.5)
playNote(40, 0.5)
playNote(35, 0.5)
playNote(36, 1)              
playNote(40, 1)

playNote(43, 0.5)
playNote(45, 0.5)
playNote(47, 0.5)
rest(0.25)
playNote(50, 0.25)
playNote(52, 0.5, sustain=0.5)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# === Complex 64-beat Hi-Hat Pattern  ===
moveTo(0)
playNote(4, 0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
rewind(0.75)
playNote(4, 0.75)
with bend(cents=[0, -30], beats=0.25):
    playNote(4, 0.25)
with bend(cents=[-30, 0], beats=0.25):
    playNote(4, 0.25)
rest(0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
rest(0.5)
playNote(4, 0.5)
for _ in range(3):
    playNote(4, 1/6)
playNote(4, 0.25)
rewind(0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)

for _ in range(8):
    playNote(4, 0.125)
rest(0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
rewind(0.5)
playNote(4, 0.25, sustain=0.5)
rest(0.25)
playNote(4, 0.5)
playNote(4, 0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
rest(0.25)
with bend(cents=[0, -40], beats=0.5):
    playNote(4, 0.5)
playNote(4, 0.25)
rewind(0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
playNote(4, 0.5)

playNote(4, 0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
rest(0.5)
playNote(4, 0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
rewind(0.25)
with bend(cents=[-50, 0], beats=0.25):
    playNote(4, 0.25)
playNote(4, 0.5)
rest(0.5)
for _ in range(4):
    playNote(4, 0.125)
rest(0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
rewind(0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
playNote(4, 0.5)
rest(0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)

with bend(cents=[0, -50], beats=0.5):
    playNote(4, 0.5)
playNote(4, 0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
rest(0.25)
for _ in range(8):
    playNote(4, 0.125)
rest(0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25)
rewind(0.25)
playNote(4, 0.25, sustain=0.25)
rest(0.25)
for _ in range(16):
    playNote(16, 0.25)
with bend(cents=[-30, 0], beats=0.5):
    playNote(16, 0.5)
playNote(32)
rest(0.5)

idata.python:
# === Complex Guitar Phrase  ===
from tunepad.chords import *
moveTo(0)
playNote(80, beats=0.25, sustain=0.5)   # E2
playNote(95, beats=0.25, sustain=0.5)   # B2
playNote(46, beats=0.5, sustain=0.5)    # E3

playNote([68, 53, 77], beats=0.25)      # E-G-B
rewind(0.25)
playNote([44, 28, 53], beats=0.25)

with bend(cents=[-20, 0], beats=0.25):
    playNote(88, beats=0.25)
playNote(41, beats=0.25)
playNote(34, beats=0.5)                 

playNote([24, 67, 88], beats=0.25, sustain=1)
rest(0.25)
playNote(49, beats=0.5)

playNote(22, beats=0.25)
playNote(64, beats=0.25)
rest(0.25)
playNote(54, beats=0.25)
playNote(67, beats=0.5)
playNote(69, beats=0.5)

from tunepad.chords import *
moveTo(0)
# ---- Utility function ----
def play_block(notes, beats=1, sustain=0):
    if isinstance(notes, int):
        playNote(notes, beats=beats, sustain=sustain)
        return
    try:
        playNote(notes, beats=beats, sustain=sustain)
    except Exception:
 #Fallback: Superimposed as simultaneous sound
        for i, n in enumerate(notes):
            playNote(n, beats=beats, sustain=sustain)
            if i < len(notes) - 1:
                rewind(beats)

def play_seq(seq):
    for item in seq:
        if len(item) == 2:
            notes, beats = item
            sustain = 0
        else:
            notes, beats, sustain = item
        play_block(notes, beats=beats, sustain=sustain)

def seq_len_beats(seq):
    total = 0
    for item in seq:
        total += item[1]
    return total

def rest_beats(b):
    rest(b)

def play_bar(rh, lh):
    len_rh = seq_len_beats(rh) if rh else 0
    len_lh = seq_len_beats(lh) if lh else 0
    bar_len = max(len_rh, len_lh)

    # The left hand first
    if lh:
        play_seq(lh)
    # Back to the beginning of the section
    if len_lh > 0:
        rewind(len_lh)
    # Then the right hand
    if rh:
        play_seq(rh)

    # If Rh is shorter than the LH, advance to the end of the measure
    tail = bar_len - len_rh
    if tail < 0:
        rest_beats(tail)

# ============== Compose the music bar by bar ==============



# ---- Section 3 ----
RH1 = [
    ([72,79,75], 0.5),
    ([65,60], 0.5),
    (60, 1),
    ([80,81,77,65], 1),
    (69, 0.5),
    ([72,77,69], 0.5),
    (72, 0.5),
    (77, 0.5),
    ([89,81], 0.5),
    (84, 0.5),
    ([91,86,85,72,79,75], 0.5),
    ([86,79,70], 1),
    ([72,69,65], 1),
]
LH1 = [
    (48, 0.5),([48,45], 0.5),([53,57], 1), (57, 1),  (57, 1)
]

# ---- Section 4----
RH2 = [
    (70, 3),
    ([82,77,74], 0.5),
    ([77,70], 0.5),
    ([79,75,72,69], 0.5),
    ([79,75,72,69], 0.5),
    (60, 1),
    ([78,74,69], 1),
    (64, 2),
]
LH2 = [
    ([46,53,58], 0.5),(50, 0.5),([53,58], 0.5),([53,57], 1), ([55,51,45], 0.5),(37, 0.5),([50,38], 0.5), ([45,36], 0.5), 
]


# ============== Play order ==============
play_bar(RH1, LH1)
play_bar(RH2, LH2)

# If there is a complete rest：
# rest_beats(4)

    playNote(67, beats=0.25)
